title: Congratulations to Yizhou Gong and Binglin He for CAC 2022 paper acceptance.
description: 'Unknown Input Observer-based Finite-time Frequency Estimator for a Biased Multi-sinusoidal Signal' and 'Modular Design of Combined Integrating Controller Based on OPTO22' written by Yizhou Gong and Binglin He were, respectively, accepted by CAC 2022. They attended the meeting successfully, together with their posters put up at presence.
